org.ardenus.json

Class Json

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.json.Json

  • public final class Json
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains commonly used functions related to JSON, and can be used for things like retrieving data with only one line of code needed.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • parse

        public static com.google.gson.JsonObject parse(java.io.InputStream in)
        Parses the specified input stream.
        Parameters:
        in - the input stream to parse.
        Returns:
        the parsed input stream as a JSON object.

      • getBoolean

        public static boolean getBoolean(com.google.gson.JsonObject json,
                                 java.lang.String key,
                                 boolean defaultValue)
        Looks through the specified JsonObject and, if possible, returns the value with the requested key.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON to look in.
        key - the key of the value to retrieve.
        defaultValue - the value to default to if the requested value does not exist.
        Returns:
        the value of the key as a boolean, if it does not exist the specified default value is returned.
